game.name: My Little Coffee Shop
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 배달원과 그의 마지막 주문에 관한 심리적 공포 게임.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Open your own coffee shop, brew coffee and desserts, serve customers, decorate the interior, and grow your business.
